page.title: 15WAPPING SCHOOL POOL BRADFORD
page.content:
Wapping Swimming Pool is {over 100 {years old. }It was the {first swimming {pool to be built in Bradford. }
Our school, Wapping First School, still uses it. Three different classes and the nursery children with their mums visit the pool each week. Two other schools nearby also have swimming lessons in the pool.
Several Bradford South Scout & Cub Groups use the pool for {swimming and {canoeing.}A football club, Ventus Utd, use it too!
The pool is 14 metres long, 5 metres wide and there are two changing rooms. It isn't very big or deep but it's warm and we love to swim!
